nichefinder
===========

A collection of functions for working with ISS (In Situ Sequencing) data,
including label transfer from a suspension reference and niche analysis.

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/nichefinder/badge/?version=latest
   :target: https://nichefinder.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
   :alt: Documentation Status

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Getting Started

   installation

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Tutorials

   notebooks/example_simulated_data
   notebooks/niche_score_mapping

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: API Reference

   api/gene_selection
   api/label_transfer
   api/niche_analysis
